description: This file defines a lightweight, custom serialization and deserialization utility ('SafeCodec') for encoding and decoding sets of strings and lists of 'StoredCartLine' objects. It employs a simple text-based format with custom escaping to ensure data stability during storage or transmission. The 'SafeCodec' object provides methods to encode/decode string sets and cart lines, handling edge cases and errors gracefully.

methods.name: encodeStringSet
methods.description: Encodes a set of strings into a single string with pipe delimiters, escaping special characters.

methods.name: decodeStringSet
methods.description: Decodes a pipe-delimited string back into a set of strings, handling escaping and trimming.

methods.name: encodeCartLines
methods.description: Encodes a list of 'StoredCartLine' objects into a newline-delimited string, with each field pipe-separated and escaped.

methods.name: decodeCartLines
methods.description: Decodes a string into a list of 'StoredCartLine' objects, parsing each line and extracting fields with unescaping and validation.
